channel.title: Comments on: Friends of A Photo Per Day

item.title: By: bluefacedpixie » Friends of A Photo Per Day
item.dc:creator: bluefacedpixie » Friends of A Photo Per Day
item.description: [...] When I had the crazy idea of starting A Photo Per Day in order to try and make myself take more photos I tried to convince a few friends to join me. So far I’ve been mostly leading by example but I think I’m starting to a pull a few more contributors into the fold, even though it’s more a “Photo Occasionally” just now. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] When I had the crazy idea of starting A Photo Per Day in order to try and make myself take more photos I tried to convince a few friends to join me. So far I’ve been mostly leading by example but I think I’m starting to a pull a few more contributors into the fold, even though it’s more a “Photo Occasionally” just now. […]
